RESOLUTION ADOPTED 3Y TBJS THIRD ASSEMBLY AT ITS MESTISG HELD OH PRIPAY, SEPT33MB5SR 22nd, 1922. (ADOPTED OH THE REPORT. OP THE SIXTH OOISIITTEP) . (Circulated for information;.) The Assembly notes with gratitude the action taken by the Council with respect to Armenia, and recommends that, in the negotiations for a peace with Turkey, the neces^ity for providing"" a national Home for the Armenians should not be overlooked, and requests the Council to take all steps which it may think; useful to secure this result.tehall Gardens, $1, 27th September, 1922,
